title: I dropped my pixel 4 xl from about 2 feet and now the phone won't turn on
content:
I dropped my pixel 4 xl from about 2 feet high and the phone just wont turn on

When I hold the power button for long, I see the google icon but stays there for  a second and goes away.

If i hold it down foe 30 seconds I see the Google loading animation and goes away.

Please help
